sense.def:
Kadar človek
chokes
, ne more pravilno dihati, ker nekaj ovira prehod skozi njegov sapnik.

seg.quote: The pungent smell of sulphur choked him.
They were enveloped in a cloud of choking dust.

sense.def:
To choke someone
pomeni nekoga stiskati za vrat, dokler ni mrtev.

seg.quote: An old woman was found choked to death.

sense.def:
Če je neki kraj
choked with things or people
, je tako poln stvari ali ljudi, da se ne morejo premikati.

seg.quote: The centre of the city was choked with cars.

sense.def:
V avtomobilu ali kakšnem drugem vozilu je
the choke
naprava, ki zmanjšuje dotok zraka v motor in tako omogoči, da laže vžge.
sense.QP:
glej slikovno prilogo
CAR AND BICYCLE
.

sense.def:
To choke back an emotion
pomeni prisiliti se, da ne pokažemo nekega čustva.
